data.text: Dawuda to a yɛtɛ findi daxui ra Abimeleki ya i alako a xa a bɛɲin, a naxa yi bɛɛti sɛbɛ.
N Alatala tantuma waxati birin.
N Alatala matɔxɔma n bɔɲɛ kui.
Won birin xa Alatala binya,
N to Alatala maxandi, a naxa n yaabi,
Naxan na a ya ti Ala ra,
Xa tɔɔrɔmixi a xui ramini,
Alatala xa malekɛ Ala yaragaaxuie rabilinma nɛ, a e kanta.
Wo a mato, Alatala fan de!
Sɛniyɛntɔɛe, wo xa gaaxu Alatala ya ra,
Kaamɛ yɛtɛe suxuma nɛ,
N ma die, wo fa, wo xa fa wo tuli mati n na.
Nde wama simaya xɔnkuye xɔn?
Xa wo wama na xɔn,
Wo xa fe ɲaaxi lu na, wo xa fe fanyi raba.
Alatala tinxintɔɛe toma nɛ, a a tuli matima e wa xui ra.
Alatala a kobe soma fe kobi rabae ra,
Tinxintɔɛe na e mawa Alatala bɛ, a a tuli matima nɛ e ra,
Alatala luma mixi fɛ ma naxan sunnunxi a bɔɲɛ ma,
Tɔɔrɛ gbegbe tinxintɔɛ lima nɛ,
Alatala mɛɛnima nɛ a ma,
Fe ɲaaxi nan mixi ɲaaxi faxama.
Alatala a xa konyie xun sarama nɛ.
